title: Following "Shot on iPhone 6" campaign, new billboards featuring Apple Watch, Apple Music target global audiences
text:

Published By: AppleInsider.com - Today 
Over the past decade, Apple began using billboards to effectively advertise iPods, then iPhones and iPads. Its newest campaigns not only pro...
